channel.title: Just for fun
channel.description:
Taking runescape classic and changing things around has always been a concern here on mscp. Every now and again a thread like this will appear with some idea on a "custom" server. The thread usually consists of an idea or a vision one has about runescape classic. What if.. rsc had specials? What if... rsc had barrage? What if... the max stat was 60? The ideas that have come up from time to time are valid and it's natural for the human brain to explore possibilities. While some threads end up to be just ideas typed into a new post, others actually... get done.
Cleaning up my hard drive...(again) and came across Realm of Asgard sauce (3hit custom pk server). RoA was one of the best servers ever around. It was merely a proof of concept and proved to us that a "custom" server has incredible potential. While not many players did get around to playing it, it made a name for itself and is considered one of the first custom servers to actually be accepted by the community.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,402622.msg2983060.html#msg2983060
[img]http://upit.cc/images/d3df68effecb78967b1911739e84ea34.png[/img]
[img]http://i33.tinypic.com/2im1iec.png[/img]
[img]http://i36.tinypic.com/4tlnpx.png[/img]
RSC is stuck in a repetitive cycle and always has been since private servers existed. While most of us will always be a fan of the original version of rsc. It will no longer exist. Do we keep living in the past, or do we take what we have and innovate it? Discuss.
If you are interested in a custom server... let me know. Right now, I am brainstorming. The project will be on github.

item.title: Just for fun
item.dc:creator: @malikz malikz
item.description:
@malikz wrote:

[quote=“mapu, post:34, topic:454472”]Here’s a video for those who did not see it when it was posted in 2009

Many people had their hands on the source. I believe the source is now being worked on and therefore is not going to be requested on my behalf to be public, however I can’t stop anyone who has it from posting it.

It’s nice to see people talking about it nowadays. I am shocked to believe there’s enough players to keep developers interested. I wish I had the time to waste but I don’t. The wilderness has never been like RSC since stork was around, since then nobody has came close to the amount of players needed to sustain an interesting server. Unless you can magically recruit new players to this game (how is it possible with the ridiculous graphics?) you could not make any variation of an RSC server entertaining without a sustainable player population.

This is why we introduced NPC vs NPC. It needs improving (the concept) however the goal should be to simulate PKER wilderness interaction by programming smart NPC’s that are (almost) player equivalent. [/quote]
Sounds like hard work. Go for it if you can!

Read full topic

item.title: Just for fun
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

Here’s a video for those who did not see it when it was posted in 2009

Many people had their hands on the source. I believe the source is now being worked on and therefore is not going to be requested on my behalf to be public, however I can’t stop anyone who has it from posting it.

It’s nice to see people talking about it nowadays. I am shocked to believe there’s enough players to keep developers interested. I wish I had the time to waste but I don’t. The wilderness has never been like RSC since stork was around, since then nobody has came close to the amount of players needed to sustain an interesting server. Unless you can magically recruit new players to this game (how is it possible with the ridiculous graphics?) you could not make any variation of an RSC server entertaining without a sustainable player population.

This is why we introduced NPC vs NPC. It needs improving (the concept) however the goal should be to simulate PKER wilderness interaction by programming smart NPC’s that are (almost) player equivalent.

Read full topic

item.title: Just for fun
item.dc:creator: @da_real_hype da real hype
item.description:
@da_real_hype wrote:

[quote=“Rodgerwilco, post:10, topic:454472”][quote author=da real hype link=topic=557340.msg4080685#msg4080685 date=1345334571]
ive always wanted a custom server to play on. i like/always liked pk servers/ custom servers. replicas are boring and i quit after a few months. custom or new content(lots of it) is what rsc needs.
[/quote]

Can you go into detail on what new content you would like to see?[/quote]

well i have a list of bajillion ideas but heres a few.

ECONOMY!!! most important

  1. new bosses/dungeons/quests
  2. minigames that can be player started if enough people join.
  3. a couple new skills

thats just some of the stuff i believe rsc needs. theres ALOT more rsc needs as pking servers die you cant just focus on the pk system need stuff to keep players entertained when pkin is dead but still update pk everytime a good idea has come up.

Read full topic
